= mr-common-web =

This module support the web layer on a web application. Was develop on top of [http://www.springsource.org/webflow/ Spring WebFlow/MVC] framework.


== Features details ==

  * Error handling and localized.
  * Binding and conversion, localized too.
  * Advance log configuration.


_This module is a part of *[Introduction mr-common]* framework_.
